Object.Field:
Author: Oracle Component Name: JKM Sybase ASE Simple Component Version: 10.1.3.1 Compatibility: ODI 10.1.3.5.0 and above
Description: Journalizing Knowledge Module This JKM provides simple journalizing procedures on Sybase ASE tables It is mandatory to define a primary Key for each journalized datastores.
Quick Start: 1. In your Model choose the simple journalizing mode 2. choose the JKM Sybase ASE Simple 3. Add datastores to the CDC 4. Start the journal
Known Limitations: - When starting the journal on a model, tables no longer in the set are unjournalized, tables missing from the set are journalized. - If the table is already journalized and is present in another model, the current journal data will be lost and the table is transfered to the new journal set. - This Knowledge Module creates triggers on your source tables. Be sure to validate the scalability of your applications before releasing your developments in your production systems. - In particular if you already have triggers on your table, this JKM will replace your own code, because Sybase don't accepte more than one trigger for each type (INS,UPD,DEL)
Requirements: The database user that is used to connect to the staging area must have at least the following privileges on the target table: SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE, CREATE TRIGGER, CREATE VIEW The database user that is used to connect to the staging area must have at least the following privileges: DROP ANY TABLE, CREATE ANY TABLE

insCmd = """ insert into <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("SNP_JRN_SUBSCRIBER")%> ( JRN_TNAME, JRN_SUBSCRIBER, JRN_REFDATE, JRN_ROW_COUNT, JRN_DATA_CMD, JRN_COUNT_CMD ) values ( /* JRN_TNAME */ '<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%>', /* JRN_SUBSCRIBER */ ?, /* JRN_REFDATE */ getdate(), /* JRN_ROW_COUNT */ 0, /* JRN_DATA_CMD */ null, /* JRN_COUNT_CMD */ 'update <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("SNP_JRN_SUBSCRIBER")%> set JRN_ROW_COUNT=(select count(''X'') from <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_NAME")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> JRN where JRN.JRN_SUBSCRIBER=''$$SUBSCRIBER_NAME$$'') where JRN_SUBSCRIBER=''$$SUBSCRIBER_NAME$$'' and JRN_TNAME = ''<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%>''' ) """
selCmd = """ select count('X') from <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("SNP_JRN_SUBSCRIBER")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> SUBS where SUBS.JRN_SUBSCRIBER = ? and SUBS.JRN_TNAME = '<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%>' """
# Prepare the statements prepInsStmt = myCon.prepareStatement(insCmd) prepSelStmt = myCon.prepareStatement(selCmd)
# Execute for each subscriber for sbs in lstSbs: prepSelStmt.setString(1, sbs) rs = prepSelStmt.executeQuery() rs.next() nbSubs = rs.getInt(1) if (nbSubs == 0): prepInsStmt.setString(1, sbs) nbRows = prepInsStmt.executeUpdate()
prepInsStmt.close() prepSelStmt.close()
# Commit the updates myCon.commit()

create table <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_NAME")%> /* This table is created in the work physical schema of the current Data server */ ( JRN_SUBSCRIBER <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "50")%> not null, JRN_CONSUMED <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "1")%> null, JRN_FLAG <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "1")%> null, JRN_DATE <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_DATE")%> null, <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]\t[DEST_WRI_DT] null", ",\n\t", "", "(PK)")%> )

create view <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_WORK_SCHEMA")%>.<%=odiRef.getInfo( "JRN_VIEW")%> /* This view is created in the work physical schema of the current Data server */ as select case when (<%=odiRef.getColList("", "convert(varchar,TARG.[COL_NAME])", " + ", "", "PK")%>) is null then 'D' else 'I' end <%= odiRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD")%> JRN_FLAG, JRN.JRN_SUBSCRIBER <%= odiRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD")%> JRN_SUBSCRIBER, JRN.JRN_DATE <%= odiRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD")%> JRN_DATE, <%=odiRef.getColList("", "JRN.[COL_NAME]		" + odiRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD") + " [COL_NAME]", ",
	", "", "PK")%>, <%=odiRef.getColList("", "TARG.[COL_NAME]		" + odiRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD") + " [COL_NAME]", ",
	", "", "NOT PK")%> from <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_NAME")%> <%= odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> JRN, <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%> <%= odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> TARG where <%=odiRef.getColList("", "TARG.[COL_NAME]	=* JRN.[COL_NAME]", "
and	", "", "PK")%> and JRN.JRN_DATE = ( select max(L.JRN_DATE) from <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_NAME")%> <%= odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> L where L.JRN_CONSUMED = '1' and L.JRN_SUBSCRIBER = JRN.JRN_SUBSCRIBER and <%=odiRef.getColList("", "L.[COL_NAME]	= JRN.[COL_NAME]", "
				and	", "", "PK")%> )

create view <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_WORK_SCHEMA")%>.<%=odiRef.getInfo( "JRN_DATA_VIEW")%> /* This view is created in the work physical schema of the current Data server */ as select case when (<%=odiRef.getColList("", "convert(varchar,TARG.[COL_NAME])", " + ", "", "PK")%>) is null then 'D' else 'I' end <%= odiRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD")%> JRN_FLAG, JRN.JRN_SUBSCRIBER <%= odiRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD")%> JRN_SUBSCRIBER, JRN.JRN_DATE <%= odiRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD")%> JRN_DATE, <%=odiRef.getColList("", "JRN.[COL_NAME]		" + odiRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD") + " [COL_NAME]", ",
	", "", "PK")%>, <%=odiRef.getColList("", "TARG.[COL_NAME]		" + odiRef.getInfo("DEST_COL_ALIAS_WORD") + " [COL_NAME]", ",
	", "", "NOT PK")%> from <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_NAME")%> <%= odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> JRN, <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%> <%= odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> TARG where <%=odiRef.getColList("", "TARG.[COL_NAME]	=* JRN.[COL_NAME]", "
and	", "", "PK")%> and JRN.JRN_DATE = ( select max(L.JRN_DATE) from <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_NAME")%> <%= odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> L where L.JRN_SUBSCRIBER = JRN.JRN_SUBSCRIBER and <%=odiRef.getColList("", "L.[COL_NAME]	= JRN.[COL_NAME]", "
				and	", "", "PK")%> )

create trigger <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_WORK_SCHEMA")%>.<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_TRIGGER")%>_U on <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%> for update as begin insert into <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_NAME")%> ( JRN_SUBSCRIBER, JRN_CONSUMED, JRN_FLAG, JRN_DATE, <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", ",\n\t\t\t", "", "PK")%> ) select JRN_SUBSCRIBER, '0', 'I', getdate(), <%=odiRef.getColList("", "\t[COL_NAME]", ",\n\t\t\t", "", "PK")%> from <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("SNP_JRN_SUBSCRIBER")%>, inserted where JRN_TNAME = '<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%>' /* The following line can be uncommented for symetric replication */ /* and upper(USER) <> upper('<%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_USER_NAME")%>') */ end

create trigger <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_WORK_SCHEMA")%>.<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_TRIGGER")%>_I on <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%> for insert as begin insert into <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_NAME")%> ( JRN_SUBSCRIBER, JRN_CONSUMED, JRN_FLAG, JRN_DATE, <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", ",\n\t\t\t", "", "PK")%> ) select JRN_SUBSCRIBER, '0', 'I', getdate(), <%=odiRef.getColList("", "\t[COL_NAME]", ",\n\t\t\t", "", "PK")%> from <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("SNP_JRN_SUBSCRIBER")%>, inserted where JRN_TNAME = '<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%>' /* The following line can be uncommented for symetric replication */ /* and upper(USER) <> upper('<%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_USER_NAME")%>') */ end

create trigger <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_WORK_SCHEMA")%>.<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_TRIGGER")%>_D on <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%> for delete as Begin insert into <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_NAME")%> ( JRN_SUBSCRIBER, JRN_CONSUMED, JRN_FLAG, JRN_DATE, <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", ",\n\t\t\t", "", "PK")%> ) select JRN_SUBSCRIBER, '0', 'I', getdate(), <%=odiRef.getColList("", "\t[COL_NAME]", ",\n\t\t\t", "", "PK")%> from <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("SNP_JRN_SUBSCRIBER")%>, deleted where JRN_TNAME = '<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%>' /* The following line can be uncommented for symetric replication */ /* and upper(USER) <> upper('<%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_USER_NAME")%>') */ end

delCmd = """ delete from <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("JRN_FULL_NAME")%> where JRN_SUBSCRIBER = ? """
# Prepare the delete prepDelStmt = myCon.prepareStatement(delCmd)
# Execute it for each subscriber for sbs in lstSbs: prepDelStmt.setString(1, sbs) nbRows = prepDelStmt.executeUpdate()
prepDelStmt.close()
# Commit updates myCon.commit()

delCmd = """ delete from <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("SNP_JRN_SUBSCRIBER")%> <%=odiRef.getInfo("DEST_TAB_ALIAS_WORD")%> SUBS where SUBS.JRN_SUBSCRIBER = ? and SUBS.JRN_TNAME = '<%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("FULL_TABLE_NAME")%>' """
# Prepare the delete prepDelStmt = myCon.prepareStatement(delCmd)
# Execute it for each subscriber for sbs in lstSbs: prepDelStmt.setString(1, sbs) nbRows = prepDelStmt.executeUpdate()
prepDelStmt.close()
# Commit the updates myCon.commit()

import java.sql as sql import java.lang as lang
# Connect to the Source Database ie the one that hosts the journalized tables myCon = odiRef.getJDBCConnection("SRC")
# Create the list of Subscribers for a CDC Set lstSbs = [] <%= odiRef.getSubscriberList("" , "lstSbs.append('[SUBSCRIBER]')", "\n", "") %>
Alter subscribers table for V3 comp
alter table <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("SNP_JRN_SUBSCRIBER")%> add JRN_ROW_COUNT <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_NUMERIC", "20")%> null, JRN_DATA_CMD TEXT null, JRN_COUNT_CMD TEXT null

create table <%=odiRef.getJrnInfo("SNP_JRN_SUBSCRIBER")%> ( JRN_TNAME <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "35")%> not null, JRN_SUBSCRIBER <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_VARCHAR", "50")%> not null, JRN_REFDATE <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_DATE")%> null, JRN_ROW_COUNT <%=odiRef.getDataType("DEST_NUMERIC", "20")%> null, JRN_DATA_CMD TEXT null, JRN_COUNT_CMD TEXT null, constraint PK_SNP_JRN_SBS primary key (JRN_TNAME, JRN_SUBSCRIBER) )
